meta.description: Explore all the features that make ESTATracker the best Michigan ESTA compliance solution: Zero-Entry Sync™, ESTA-Logic™ engine, audit reports, and more.

props.headline: Everything You Need for ESTA Compliance
props.subheadline: From automatic tracking to audit-ready reports, ESTATracker handles it all.

features.title: Zero-Entry Sync™
features.description: Connect to QuickBooks, Gusto, ADP, Square, When I Work. Hours worked are imported automatically forever.

features.title: ESTA-Logic™ Engine
features.description: Our engine calculates accruals based on Michigan ESTA law: 1 hour for every 30 hours worked.

features.title: Carryover Management
features.description: Automatically handles year-end carryover rules based on your employer size tier.

features.title: Usage Caps & Limits
features.description: Enforces maximum usage limits so employees never exceed their available balance.

features.title: Notifications & Alerts
features.description: Get notified of important deadlines, policy changes, and employee requests.

features.title: Secure Data Storage
features.description: Enterprise-grade security protects your employee data with encryption at rest and in transit.

features.title: Employer Dashboard
features.description: See all your employees' sick time balances at a glance. Filter, sort, and export as needed.

features.title: Compliance Reports
features.description: Generate PDF reports for state audits with a single click. All required fields are included.

features.title: Policy Configuration
features.description: Set your company policies once. The system adapts to your specific accrual and usage rules.

features.title: Multi-Location Support
features.description: Manage employees across multiple Michigan locations from one central account.

features.title: Mobile-Friendly Portal
features.description: Employees access their balances from any device, anytime.

features.title: Full History View
features.description: See every accrual, usage, and adjustment with clear timestamps.

features.title: Export Records
features.description: Employees can download their own records for personal recordkeeping.

features.title: Self-Service Requests
features.description: Submit time-off requests directly through the portal.

props.headline: See these features in action
props.subheadline: Book a private demo and experience effortless ESTA compliance.
